Package control.Authentication

Class AuthenticationService

java.lang.Object
control.Authentication.AuthenticationService
public class AuthenticationService extends Object

Authentication Service Class

It is used to handle all the authentication logic system.
Some of its methods:
  • Register
  • Log-in
  • Forget Password
  • Validation methods/li>
Author:
Maya Ayman, Rawan Younis, Mohamed Essam

  • Method Details

    • validatePassword

      public boolean validatePassword(String password)
      This Method is used to validate Password Input.

      Strong Password Specifications:

      • Minimum length 8 characters.
      • Max length 20 characters.
      • At least one capital letter.
      • At least one small letter.
      • At least one symbol.
      Parameters:
      password -
      Returns:
      boolean

    • validatePhone

      public boolean validatePhone(String phoneNumber)
      This Method is used to validate phone number of the user if it follows some certain guidelines.
      eg: Number should start with {010,011,012,015}.
      Parameters:
      phoneNumber -
      Returns:
      boolean

    • register

      public boolean register(User user) throws SQLException
      This Method is used to check if user found in the database or not, Then add user to the database.
      Parameters:
      user -
      Returns:
      boolean weather the user is registered or not
      Throws:
      SQLException - to handle database errors
